# invalid

**Type Property**

A value that represents an invalid time.

## Declaration

```swift
static let invalid: CMTime
```

## Discussion

An invalid time has all of its fields set to `0`.

Don’t test a time against this constant using (time == [doc://com.apple.coremedia/documentation/CoreMedia/CMTime/invalid]) because there are many times that are also invalid. Use [doc://com.apple.coremedia/documentation/CoreMedia/CMTIME_IS_INVALID(_:)] instead.

## Constants

- **zero**: A value that represents time zero.
- **indefinite**: A value that represents an indefinite time.
- **negativeInfinity**: A value that represents negative infinity.
- **positiveInfinity**: A value that represents positive infinity.
